site_description: Temple University BFA Showcase 2022 | Musical Theater | Philadelphia
content1: Scroll down to find individual artists' video performances, headshots, resumés, and contacts.\nThank you for viewing and for your consideration for future projects and representation.\nTo request a virtual meeting, please feel free to reach out via the contact button on each actor's page.
content2: Click on a headshot below to see the video performance, headshot, and resumé of each artist.
content3: If you would prefer to download all the actors' headshots and resumes at once for contact information, please click button below for a zip file.
download_text: Download Temple class of 2022 zip file
videos_text: View all videos together on YouTube
